title: Unable to Click on Friends List, Chatroom List, or Notifications!
body:
Hi, so I just logged onto League for the first time today... First of all, the client looks a lot different. It seems that everything should theoretically work the same way, but the face just looks different. However, I am unable to click on any of the 3 buttons in the lower right-hand corner to view them. I see them all flashing as if I have something the game wants me to see, but when I try to click on them, nothing happens. Is anyone else having this problem? Any potential solutions?

Note: I've restarted the client itself 3 times, and I've restarted my computer twice. I've tried using both a wireless connection and a wired connection to see if that had anything to do with it. I can't think of anything else to try!

replies.body:
Hey Moneymonster7, 

Have you tried repairing the client up in the top right corner before logging in? I would suggest trying that first and if that doesn't seem to work, send in a ticket to Riot. No one needs a poltergeist in their gaming system xD 

Riot Support Ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
Update: It would appear Riot accidentally put me on the alpha client or something, so when I repaired, everything returned to normal. My client was MUCH different before when I had the glitch...
I have not tried repairing yet... To be honest, I didn't even know that existed. I will give that a shot and update you on how it goes! Thanks!
